data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Northern Cape, South Africa to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 647,159 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern Cape, South Africa
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Northern Cape, South Africa into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.section_summary: On average, 49 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Northern Cape, South Africa.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Northern Cape. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 172,241 believers living in Northern Cape, South Africa.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Malay, Cape people might believe through him.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Northern Cape, South Africa not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 819,400 people living in the state of Northern Cape.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Northern Cape to agree with you and with one another.
